h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
content: If you head along the outside path, you'll find another open jail cell bars to re-enter the interior hall and reach another green Wisp, but be ready to deal with the ambushing Cyan Bat above and Abomination below.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pagoda_Realm_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm', specifically from the subsection 'Lower Pagoda (Level 1)'.
The content is as follows:
If you head along the outside path, you'll find another open jail cell bars to re-enter the interior hall and reach another green Wisp, but be ready to deal with the ambushing Cyan Bat above and Abomination below.
